comments.text:
My business plan is to talk shit about Ferrari (for example, telling people 
that a stock-standard GTR from Nissan crushes this tin can, which happens 
to be a fact and nothing to do with me), and then negotiate a cash 
settlement whereby Ferrari pays me to stop giving them bad press. Please 
feel free to comment or make suggestions about how this plan can be 
improved upon.﻿
